sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select etl.starttime,source,FileNameZip,FileNameData,el.BusinessObject,CASE WHEN etl.Status = 1 THEN ''ACK'' ELSE ''ERROR'' END NotificationType,etl.ErrorMessage,FileLine,
CASE WHEN etl.Status = 1 THEN '''' ELSE ''/uem/dev/edgenta/azure/outbound/log/''+replace(el.FileNameZip,''.zip'','''')+''_Error_Log.zip'' END ErrorLocation
 from eventlog el inner join eventtasklog etl on el.EventID = etl.EventID
where el.eventid = ''',pipeline().parameters.ParentPipelineID,''' and etl.StepName=''Check Checksum''')

CASE WHEN etl.Status = 1 THEN '''' ELSE ''/uem/dev/edgenta/azure/outbound/log/''+replace(el.FileNameZip,''.zip'','''')+''_Error_Log.zip'' END ErrorLocation
